query:
-- Deletar o módulo de Divisão que tem apenas 3 aulas (o menor)
DELETE FROM modules 
WHERE disciplineId = 1 
AND name = 'Divisão' 
AND id NOT IN (
  SELECT moduleId FROM (
    SELECT moduleId, COUNT(*) as page_count 
    FROM pages 
    WHERE moduleId IN (SELECT id FROM modules WHERE name = 'Divisão' AND disciplineId = 1)
    GROUP BY moduleId 
    ORDER BY page_count DESC 
    LIMIT 1
  ) AS keep_module
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3791tceNk2iYTis.4402e8216d86 --database T5Ee3HJGcPdFeU4iAe9r9p --execute -- Deletar o módulo de Divisão que tem apenas 3 aulas (o menor)
DELETE FROM modules 
WHERE disciplineId = 1 
AND name = 'Divisão' 
AND id NOT IN (
  SELECT moduleId FROM (
    SELECT moduleId, COUNT(*) as page_count 
    FROM pages 
    WHERE moduleId IN (SELECT id FROM modules WHERE name = 'Divisão' AND disciplineId = 1)
    GROUP BY moduleId 
    ORDER BY page_count DESC 
    LIMIT 1
  ) AS keep_module
);
